p: Table 2 shows that when comparing the antifungal efficacy at both 24 and 48h of the four concentrations of EOC (25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%) with nystatin, it was found that there were statistically significant differences ( P < 0.001). Otherwise, when comparing the efficacy of each concentration independently at 24 versus 48 hours, statistically significant differences were also found with a P < 0.001 [ Graph 2].
